TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CalendarDay extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 控制項中的日期。

span.span: Represents a date in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件所表示日期的日期控制項。A object represents a date in the control. 您可以使用這個類別中的事件處理常式加入上轉譯，以程式設計方式存取的日期屬性控制項。You can use this class in the event handler to programmatically access the properties of a date as it is rendered on the control. 這可讓您決定一天 （例如，日期是可選取，選取今天的日期或週末的日期） 的屬性，並以程式設計方式控制的外觀或行為的一天。This allows you to determine the properties of the day (such as whether the date is selectable, selected, today's date, or a weekend date) and programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用的屬性物件，以判斷是否正在呈現的日期在事件就會顯示月份中且未落在星期六或星期日。The following example demonstrates how to use the properties of a object to determine whether the date being rendered in the event is in the displayed month and do not fall on Saturday or Sunday. 這些日期會以黃色顯示。These dates are displayed in yellow. 請注意，屬性物件傳遞至事件處理常式是物件。Note that the property of the object passed into the event handler is the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CalendarDay Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CalendarDay Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CalendarDay Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CalendarDay Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarDayRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarDayRender/CS/calendardayrendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarDayRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarDayRender/VB/calendardayrendervb.aspx#1)]

public: CalendarDay(DateTime date, bool isWeekend, bool isToday, bool isSelected, bool isOtherMonth, System::String ^ dayNumberText);

param.name: date
param.span: 物件，包含這個類別的執行個體所表示的日期。

span.span: A object that contains the date represented by an instance of this class.

param.span: 指示這個類別的執行個體所代表的日期為星期六或星期日，否則為 。

span.span: to indicate that the date represented by an instance of this class is either a Saturday or a Sunday; otherwise, .

param.span: 指示這個類別的執行個體所代表的日期為目前日期，否則為 。

span.span: to indicate that the date represented by an instance of this class is the current date; otherwise, .

param.span: 指示這個類別的執行個體所代表的日期在 控制項上被選取，否則為 。

span.span: to indicate that the date represented by an instance of this class is selected on the control; otherwise, .

span.span: to indicate that the date represented by an instance of this class is in a month other than the displayed month on the control; otherwise, .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 這個建構函式可供使用，雖然執行個體類別不通常會動態建立。Although this constructor is available, an instance of the class is not typically created dynamically. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |日期Date|`date` 參數的值。The value of the `date` parameter.| |DayNumberTextDayNumberText|`dayNumberText` 參數的值。The value of the `dayNumberText` parameter.| |IsOtherMonthIsOtherMonth|`isOtherMonth` 參數的值。The value of the `isOtherMonth` parameter.| |IsSelectedIsSelected|`isSelected` 參數的值。The value of the `isSelected` parameter.| |IsTodayIsToday|`isToday` 參數的值。The value of the `isToday` parameter.| |IsWeekendIsWeekend|`isWeekEnd` 參數的值。The value of the `isWeekEnd` parameter.|

summary.span: 取得這個類別的執行個體所代表的日期。

span.span: Gets the date represented by an instance of this class.
This property is read-only.

value.span: 物件，包含這個類別的執行個體所表示的日期。

span.span: A object that contains the date represented by an instance of this class.

value.span: 這允許您根據這個值，以程式設計的方式控制日期的外觀或行為。

span.span: This allows you to programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day, based on this value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以程式設計方式判斷此類別的執行個體所表示日期的屬性。Use the property to programmatically determine the date represented by an instance of this class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用比較中所呈現的日期屬性事件今天的日期。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to compare the date being rendered in the event with today's date. 如果日期為今天的日期，其上會顯示紅色與黃色儲存格中控制項。If the date is today's date, it is displayed in a yellow cell with red text on the control. span.span: Gets the string equivalent of the day number for the date represented by an instance of the class.
This property is read-only.

value.span: 這個類別的執行個體所代表的日期日數的對等字串。

span.span: The string equivalent of the day number for the date represented by an instance of this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷此類別的執行個體所表示日期的日數的對等字串。Use the property to determine the string equivalent of the day number for the date represented by an instance of this class. 這允許您根據這個值，以程式設計的方式控制日期的外觀或行為。This allows you to programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day, based on this value. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示所選的日期的數字上控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to display the selected day number on the control. summary.span: 取得值，指出這個類別的執行個體所代表的日期是否在不是 控制項上所顯示的月份中。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the date represented by an instance of this class is in a month other than the month displayed in the control.
This property is read-only.

value.span: 如果這個類別的執行個體所代表的日期在不是 控制項上所顯示的月份中，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the date represented by an instance of this class is in a month other than the month displayed in the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來以程式設計方式判斷此類別的執行個體所表示日期是否在一個月中顯示的月份以外控制項。Use the property to programmatically determine whether the date represented by an instance of this class is in a month other than the month displayed in the control. 這可讓您以程式設計方式控制的外觀或行為，這個值為基礎的當日。This allows you to programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day based on this value. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用的屬性物件，以判斷是否正在呈現的日期在事件是顯示月份中，而且不是星期六或星期日。The following example demonstrates how to use the properties of a object to determine whether the date being rendered in the event is in the displayed month and are not either a Saturday or a Sunday. 這些日期會以黃色顯示。These dates are displayed in yellow. 請注意，屬性物件傳遞至事件處理常式是物件。Note that the property of the object passed into the event handler is the object. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出這個類別的執行個體所代表的日期是否在 控制項中可被選取。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the date represented by an instance of this class can be selected in the control.

value.span: 如果日期可被選取，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the date can be selected; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或決定是否可以在選取此類別的執行個體所表示日期控制項。Use the property to specify or determine whether the date represented by an instance of this class can be selected in the control. 這可讓您以程式設計方式控制為一天的外觀行為根據此值。This allows you to programmatically control the appearance behavior of the day, based on this value. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性停用在選取的目前日期的能力控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to disable the ability to select the current date on the control. 請注意，屬性物件傳遞至事件處理常式是物件。Note that the property of the object passed into the event handler is the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CalendarDay.IsSelectable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CalendarDay.IsSelectable Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CalendarDay.IsSelectable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CalendarDay.IsSelectable Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來以程式設計方式判斷是否在選取此類別的執行個體所表示日期控制項。Use the property to programmatically determine whether the date represented by an instance of this class is selected in the control. 這允許您根據這個值，以程式設計的方式控制日期的外觀或行為。This allows you to programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day, based on this value. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷是否在中選取目前的日期。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine if the current date is selected in the . 請注意，屬性物件傳遞至事件處理常式是物件。Note that the property of the object passed into the event handler is the object. This property is read-only.

value.span: 如果這個類別的執行個體所代表的日期是 控制項之 屬性所指定的相同日期，則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來以程式設計方式判斷此類別的執行個體所表示日期是否為所指定的相同日期屬性控制項。Use the property to programmatically determine whether the date represented by an instance of this class is the same date specified by the property of the control. 這允許您根據這個值，以程式設計的方式控制日期的外觀或行為。This allows you to programmatically control the appearance or behavior of the day, based on this value. > [!NOTE] > 雖然所指定的日期屬性是通常在伺服器上的系統日期，可以變更它，如有必要。Although the date specified by the property is usually the system date on the server, it is possible to change it, if necessary. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷是否要在呈現的日期事件是目前日期。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine if the date being rendered in the event is the current date. 如果日期為目前的日期，其上會顯示紅色與黃色儲存格中。If the date is the current date, it is displayed in a yellow cell with red text on the . 請注意，屬性物件傳遞至事件處理常式是物件。Note that the property of the object passed into the event handler is the object.
